communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: Incel_0035_c3302d is at an active stage in his trajectory, marked by his role as an aggressor within the incel_misogyny community. His offline life is strained by job dissatisfaction at the factory where he works and a deep sense of social isolation. With limited exposure to supportive environments, his path seems set on a course of increasing aggression and resentment.
narratives.p_intro: Meet incel_0035_c3302d, a 25-34 year old male from North America, whose online presence is defined by anger and confrontation. He targets women and society at large, fueled by his experiences of dating failures and a deep-seated resentment towards gender roles and social hierarchies. Despite his aggressive demeanor, he has a love for telling jokes and a surprising punctuality, always arriving early to everything. His hope to change the world is overshadowed by his current path of hostility.
